title: Database Design Reality Check: When to Normalize vs When to Denormalize (And Why Most Teams Get It Wrong)
excerpt: Look, I've been building systems for years, and I can't tell you how many times I've walked into a project where someone decided to "optimize" their database by throwing normalization out the window. Or worse, they've normalized everything to death and wonder why their reports take forever to load.
